admin/editor.wordpressCategoryBlock.desc: Displays the most recent three posts from a given WP category
admin/editor.wordpressCategoryBlockCateg: Numeric ID of desired Wordpress category
admin/editor.wordpressCategoryBlockTitle: Leave blank to use name of Wordpress category as title
admin/editor.wordpressCategoryBlockDescr: A short description to be shown at top of category block
admin/editor.wordpressCategoryBlockCusto: If left blank, block will link to the standard blog category page showing a paginated list of all posts in that category
If left blank, link will say 'All (category) Posts >
admin/editor.wordpressTwoColumns.title: Use Two Column Layout
admin/editor.wordpressTwoColumns.descrip: First post will be shown in left column, remaining posts stacked in right column
admin/editor.wordpressNumberOfPosts.desc: Recommended to show between 3 and 5 posts
admin/editor.wordpressCategoryRelatedPos: Displays one or more posts tagged with a VTEX category identifier
admin/editor.wordpressRelatedCategoryIde: Recommended to use category ID for related post tags
admin/editor.wordpressCustomDomain.title: Custom Domain (optional)
admin/editor.wordpressCustomDomain.descr: To load WordPress data from a domain other than the default (for this block only), enter the domain here, i.e. http://blog.com/
admin/editor.wordpressOverlays.title: Use Text Overlays
admin/editor.wordpressOverlays.descripti: Overlay post title and meta info on top of post image
admin/editor.wordpressDates.title: Show Dates
admin/editor.wordpressDates.description: Show date that each post was posted
admin/editor.wordpressAuthors.title: Show Authors
admin/editor.wordpressExcerpts.title: Show Excerpts
admin/editor.wordpressCategories.title: Show Categories
admin/editor.wordpressCategories.descrip: Show first category of each post
admin/editor.wordpressLatestPosts.title: Wordpress Latest Posts Block
admin/editor.wordpressLatestPosts.descri: Displays the most recent three posts from Wordpress
admin/editor.wordpressLatestPostsTitle.d: A title to be shown at top of latest posts block
admin/editor.wordpressRelatedPosts.title: Wordpress Related Posts Block
admin/editor.wordpressRelatedPosts.descr: Displays the most recent three posts from Wordpress tagged with a given product reference code
A title to be shown at top of related posts block
admin/editor.wordpressSearch.title: Wordpress Search Block
admin/editor.wordpressSearch.description: Displays a search box that can be used to perform a blog article search
admin/editor.wordpressRelatedProducts.de: Displays products tagged in a particular blog post, with the tag format 'prod-[ProductReferenceCode]'
Displays 3-5 article search results on the product search results page based on current product query, with a link to a full article search page
admin/editor.wordpressAllPosts.title: Wordpress All Posts Block
admin/editor.wordpressAllPosts.descripti: Displays a paginated list of all blog posts, most recent first
admin/editor.wordpressPage.title: Wordpress Page Block
admin/editor.wordpressPage.description: Dynamically displays a Wordpress 'page' based on the 'slug' parameter from the store route
admin/editor.wordpressPost.title: Wordpress Post Block
admin/editor.wordpressPost.description: Dynamically displays a Wordpress 'post' based on the 'slug' parameter from the store route
admin/editor.wordpressCategory.title: Wordpress Category Block
admin/editor.wordpressCategory.descripti: Dynamically displays a paginated list of posts from a Wordpress category based on the 'categoryslug' parameter from the store route
admin/editor.wordpressSearchResult.title: Wordpress Search Result Block
admin/editor.wordpressSearchResult.descr: Dynamically displays a paginated list of article search results using the 'term' parameter from the store route as the search query
admin/editor.wordpressCustomDomains.desc: If you wish to load blog data from more than one Wordpress domain, enter a JSON list of custom domains and URL slugs. See app documentation for more information and examples.
admin/editor.wordpressCustomDomainSlug.d: Enter the URL slug that will represent this Wordpress domain
admin/editor.wordpressBreadcrumb.title: Wordpress Breadcrumb
admin/editor.wordpressBreadcrumb.descrip: Displays a breadcrumb specific to your VTEX blog pages, i.e. 'Blog Home / (category) / (title of post)'
